column4: when I burn a dvd with brasero, at 99% it give me an error, it burns it ok, i checked also in another computer the dvd and all data is ok, I just missed the copy/paste of the error, any idea what can it be ?
Must be the closing session part on your burning process
I am sure that is the problem, but I have no idea how to solve it
try to wait for it to finish... takes a while specially if its dvd...
I wait until it is finished, the error pops up, I will burn one now to show you
burning now ^^ i set it up to leave the session open
I will tell you in a few mins if error
Okay...
I really dont think it is the cd burner rom, it is new it burns it ok, brasero just doesn't close it
without closing the session, the dvd burns with no error
try burning some stuff in windows if it closes ok
Honestly, i dont trust brasero Lol
I burned a dvd in windows and closed the dvd with no problem
It is a brasero issue for sure
I wish i can help you more... but maybe somebody else can help you on why brasero is not closing your session properly...
there is another cd burner ?
i just use brasero, and when it messed up burning tinyxp installer at x1, i decided to burn stuff from windows (ubuntu and xubuntu boot disks) :)
is sad to know there are not many options to burn dvd from linux, I will try K3b
good luck, keep us posted if its any better than brasero
I wont install it, it is asking for a lot of kde libs that I dont want to install
any idea where logs are saved in brasero ?
sorry mate i don't know
I will try gnomebaker
